title: Ranked Game cancelled???
body:
Was in a game (losing) and the game just ended and it wasnt recorded.. happen between 9:49 and 9:56 AM PST

was really weird.

replies.body:
Chermorg is almost spot on. Basically, the game crashed for everyone and it disappeared from the servers. Since the game wasn't there anymore, I'm assuming you weren't able to reconnect at all. 

If that's the case, then it happened for everyone else as well and nobody will be getting any penalties for it!

If everyone in the game disconnects at the same time and nobody starts reconnecting, the server assumes there’s an issue and kills the game.

It’s like Loss Prevented, but automatically done by the server if everyone in a game is no longer connected.
